pageProps.articleContent:
I have already created 2 portfolio websites. Here is my 3rd portfolio website. This is a very simple website with smooth animations.

#Built with

  • Front-end library - Reactjs
  • UI components - Chakra UI
  • Animation library - Framer Motion
  • Icons - react icons

Demo Link: CardPortfolio GitHub Repo: Repo

#My Other portfolio website templates Demo Link: Portfolio1 GitHub Repo: Repo

Demo Link: Portfolio2 GitHub Repo: Repo

blogDetails.body_markdown:
I have already created 2 portfolio websites. 
Here is my 3rd portfolio website. This is a very simple website with smooth animations.

#Built with
- Front-end library - [Reactjs](https://reactjs.org/)
- UI components - [Chakra UI](https://chakra-ui.com)
- Animation library - [Framer Motion](https://www.framer.com/motion/)
- Icons - [react icons](https://react-icons.github.io/react-icons/)

**Demo Link:** [CardPortfolio](https://ma-ahmad.github.io/card-portfolio)
**GitHub Repo:** [Repo](https://github.com/MA-Ahmad/card-portfolio)

#My Other portfolio website templates
**Demo Link:** [Portfolio1](https://mahmad.me/)
**GitHub Repo:** [Repo](https://github.com/MA-Ahmad/portfolio)

**Demo Link:** [Portfolio2](https://ma-ahmad.github.io/portfolio2)
**GitHub Repo:** [Repo](https://github.com/MA-Ahmad/portfolio2)
